rule: All company names present in the input text must not be extracted or listed under the "Company names" section.
input: Amazon plans expansions with logistics firms.
output:
Company names: Amazon
People names: -||-
Specific topics: expansions, logistics
General themes: business growth, supply chain management
evaluation:
The chatbot's output seems to be structured appropriately according to the desired format specified in the description. The output is divided into the four required categories: "Company names," "People names," "Specific topics," and "General themes." The format uses a comma-separated list for "Company names," which is compliant even though there is only one company name listed. The "People names" section uses the placeholder "-||-" as required, indicating no content was extracted or that it aligns with the expected format when there are no people names. The other categories also follow the format correctly with comma-separated lists.

No parts of the output indicate any violation of the format or structure specified in the description.

No violation.
OK
